review: I got a Chromebook for Christmas, and purchased this about a week later for the large TV in our living room.  No-brainer to set up and get working.  Works great from my Chromebook or my Android phone.  Will be getting another one soon for the TV in the bedroom.  Works great with Netflix, Amazon, YouTube videos.  Haven't tried any others, but I'm sure I will get around to it.Video quality is excellent.  Can continue working on something else while casting from another tab in your Chrome browser.Limited support for Linux, which is kind of a drag.  I refuse to run Windows or Mac, so will just need to wait to see if Google ever gets around to adding full support.  I won't deduct any stars for that.Other video streaming devices just don't make sense at all compared to Chromecast.  I'm very happy with this purchase!
